topics.body:
Also.

I FINALLY KILLED THAT FUCKING MOSQUITO THAT WAS IN MY ROOM!

And Ironically the way I finally caught the stupid thing was hilarious.

This whole time I've been trying to smash him with both my hands right?

Well I literally was lazing around and saw him flying right? I just reach out my hand and crushed him with no hostility at all.

Just "Oh its the mosquito again" *Grab* "Aaaand its dead...Wow"

topics.body:
A had a interesting thought on how video game companies can make a open world game for cheap and have it still a large world; make it out on the open ocean and space out all the important stuff just out of render distance of each other to reduce processor usage.

Essentially Wind Waker.
